attributes.action: Improve mental health services for children and adolescents who are neurodiverse
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS children and adolescent mental health services are failing our children with neurodiversity. Early intervention, diagnosis, treatment and support is integral to enable them to thrive. 

CAMHS desperately requires better funding so that the staffing, treatment and care problems can be improved. By underfunding these services, the health and wellbeing of our young people is currently being put at tremendous risk.
attributes.background: Offer more funding to NHS Child and Adolescents Mental Health Services to enable early diagnosis, intervention, treatment and support for children who are neurodiverse

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703764
